UserProfile.title: User Profile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user's complete profile and application-specific data stored in Firestore.

uid.description: The user's unique ID from Firebase Authentication, acting as the document key.

displayName.description: The user's display name, synced from their auth provider.

email.description: The user's email address, synced from their auth provider.

photoURL.description: URL of the user's profile picture, synced from their auth provider.

provider.description: The authentication provider used for the last sign-in (e.g., 'google.com').

points.description: Total points earned by the user for completing tasks and other activities.

credits.description: Currency that can be purchased or earned, used for unlocking special features.

level.description: The user's current level, which may unlock new features or rewards.

referralCode.description: A unique, auto-generated code for referring other users.

referredBy.description: The UID of the user who referred this user, if applicable.

createdAt.description: The timestamp of when the user document was first created (first login).

lastLogin.description: The timestamp of the user's last login, updated on every sign-in.

totalLogins.description: A counter for the total number of times the user has logged in.

notificationsEnabled.description: Whether the user has enabled push notifications.

darkMode.description: Whether the user has enabled dark mode.

definition.description: Stores all public and private data for a user. The document ID is the same as the Firebase Auth UID, ensuring a 1:1 relationship.

params.name: userId
params.description: The unique identifier for the user, matching their Firebase Auth UID.
